survey_name: Renewable Energy Home Installation Interest Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand homeowner interest and preferences regarding renewable energy installations, such as solar panels and wind turbines, to better tailor services and incentives.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with renewable energy options for homes?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for this single-choice question to maintain clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question. Ensure the options are displayed vertically.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with renewable energy options for homes?

questions.question_text: Which renewable energy solutions are you most interested in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for this multi-choice question to allow multiple selections.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question. Ensure respondents can select more than one option.

script.question_text: Which renewable energy solutions are you most interested in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason for your interest in renewable energy solutions?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason for your interest in renewable energy solutions?

questions.question_text: Please specify your primary reason if you selected 'Other'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture specific reasons not listed in Q3.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field. Display only if 'Other' is selected in Q3.

script.question_text: Please specify your primary reason if you selected 'Other'.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to install a renewable energy system in your home in the next 5 years?

script.question_text: How likely are you to install a renewable energy system in your home in the next 5 years?
